dialogue.introduction: Ye~s, It's Miss Kinugasa's debut! Together with Aoba, take good care of me!
dialogue.library_intro: First to have a catapult equipped, Miss Kinugasa! Great to meet you. I performed magnificently in the capture of Wake Island and the Battle of the Coral Sea, and even the Solomon's Ironbottom Sound! But... planes, you know? I'm not really a fan...
dialogue.secretary2: Let get to work today too!
dialogue.secretary3: If you keep touching me, I'll touch you back~ Hey hey!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Oi! Ooi! Oh, you're not Ooi? Ah, he glared at me.
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, so that I can protect you, I'm gonna get stronger and stronger! But, if it get dangerous, you have to promise to get away, okay? I don't want to lose someone important to me.
dialogue.show_players_score: Hm-hmm~ How's it? May I look?
dialogue.equipment2: Hey! Don't be watching me modernise!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Ow-w-w~ Aoba's going to laugh at me again~!
dialogue.ship_construction: A new ships built! So fast~
dialogue.battle_start: Naval battle! I'm gonna start, yeah?
dialogue.mvp: Hm-hmm, isn't Miss Kinugasa the strongest! When we get back, I'm gonna boast about it to Aoba!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Hawawa! The bridge is looking bad!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Geh! Direct hit!? ... Admiral.. erm... could you not look?

hourly.0000: It's midnight. Miss Kinugasa's sound asleep. Zzzz...
hourly.0100: ...nya~ It's 1 A.M.? Not going to sleep?
hourly.0300: It's 3 A.M. Hey? Just when will you go to bed?
hourly.0400: It's 4 A.M.! So it's come to this... Just do it! All-nighter!
hourly.0500: 5 A.M! The weather report's starting, you know?
hourly.0700: 7 A.M, somehow, the world's in such a rush now.
hourly.0800: 8 A.M, how about watching the morning soaps?
hourly.0900: 9 A.M. You done the daily quests?
hourly.1000: It's 10 A.M. Won't you redecorate the room soon?
hourly.1100: 11 A.M. Oh, there's such a nice smell coming from the mess~
hourly.1200: Beep-beep-beep-pom~! 12 midday, time for lunch! My lunch is curry! What are yo~u having?
hourly.1300: 1 P.M, how about taking a siesta? Zzz...zzz...
hourly.1400: It's 2 P.M. Admiral, work hard this afternoon too!
hourly.1600: 4 P.M., it's almost evening, isn't it~
hourly.1700: 5 in the evening! What are you doing 'After Five'? Eh? People don't use that anymore?
hourly.1900: 7 P.M, I'm having dinner~ Still curry?!
hourly.2000: 8 P.M. Now then, it's getting heavier, yeah? Ah, I'm not talking about my weight, yeah?
hourly.2100: 9 P.M, oh? Someone's coming. Ah! It's Aoba! Good work today!
hourly.2200: 10 P.M, Aoba, I heard that she did some reporting. She can be both a reporter and a warship~
hourly.2300: 11 P.M. Admiral? It's about time for bed, you know? ...eh? Your best performance starts now? Aren't you energetic~
